Html:
Hi,

in some discussions I read about WPP v2. Just curious - is there a timeline when WPP v2 will be available?

Hi, there is no timeline. WPP V1 work pretty much well, so I will take my time to release V2. Additionally, I would like to pass some Certifications (Microsoft, VMware, Symantec ...). So, in 2015, I will spend a lot of time at reading books, watching videos... and so on.
